feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud NGFW
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud NGFW

entry.content: You can create a secure tag at the organization level and bind its value to all virtual machine (VM) instances across that organization, instead of applying tags to instances within a specific network. For more information, see Secure tags for firewalls. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: You can now create secure tags at the organization level, applying them to all virtual machine instances organization-wide. This simplifies tag management and enhances security across your infrastructure. The feature is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Organization-Level Secure Tags Now Available
